description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Andreas Hallberg - Security Software Engineer at TrueSec

ABSTRACT
What is "secure code"?
This session will introduce you to a safe mindset when developing applications. You will learn how to make the concept of trust a first class citizen in your code, how to make [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Secure%20Coding%20Patterns
